sentences.en: A lot of money went on wining and dining prospective clients.
sentences.cn: 很多钱都花在宴请潜在客户上了。

sentences.en: A picture of Rory O'Moore hangs in the dining room at Kildangan.
sentences.cn: 一幅罗里·奥穆尔的画像挂在基尔丹根的餐厅里。

sentences.en: Food in the dining car was adequate, if uninspired.
sentences.cn: 餐车里的食品虽然量足够多，但花样太少。

sentences.en: For our dining room I have chosen ochre yellow walls.
sentences.cn: 我决定把我们餐厅的墙壁刷成赭黄色。
大多数晚上他都独自进餐。

sentences.en: He made his way into the dining car for breakfast.
sentences.cn: 他来到餐车车厢吃早饭。

sentences.en: He winced at the thought of dining with Camilla.
sentences.cn: 一想到要跟卡米拉一起吃饭，他皱起了眉头。

sentences.en: In the dining-room the draperies create an atmosphere of elegance.
sentences.cn: 在餐厅里，打褶装饰物能营造雅致的氛围。

sentences.en: Meals are taken communally in the dining room.
On the day they visited him, Professor Huggins was dining.
sentences.cn: 警方拜访哈金斯教授的那天，他正在进餐。

sentences.en: One of his jobs was supervising the dining room.
sentences.cn: 他的工作之一是管理餐厅。

sentences.en: She checked the seating arrangements before the guests filed into the dining-room.
sentences.cn: 在客人们鱼贯进入餐厅之前，她核实了一遍座位安排。

sentences.en: The Coronata wallpaper lends a formal air to the dining room.
sentences.cn: 科罗娜塔墙纸给餐厅增添了一种整齐有致的气氛。

sentences.en: The dining room has lakeside views and offers excellent cuisine.
sentences.cn: 在那家饭店用餐能欣赏到湖边景色，而且那里饭菜也是美味佳肴。

sentences.en: The kitchen is right next door to the dining room.
This is our kitchen, sitting and dining room all rolled into one.
sentences.cn: 这既是我们的厨房，又是客厅和餐厅。

sentences.en: You won't have to lay out a fortune for this dining table.
sentences.cn: 你不必为这张餐桌花一大笔钱。

words.tran_cn: 用餐者；路边小饭店；餐车式简便餐厅

trans.tran_en: When you dine, you have dinner
